text.english: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, Whose sin is covered. I acknowledged my sin to You, And my iniquity I have not hidden. I said, "I will confess my transgressions to the LORD," And You forgave the iniquity of my sin.Selah
text.arabic: طُوبَى لِلَّذِي غُفِرَ إِثْمُهُ وَسُتِرَتْ خَطِيَّتُهُ. أَعْتَرِفُ لَكَ بِخَطِيَّتِي وَلاَ أَكْتُمُ إِثْمِي. قُلْتُ: [أَعْتَرِفُ لِلرَّبِّ بِذَنْبِي] وَأَنْتَ رَفَعْتَ أَثَامَ خَطِيَّتِي. سِلاَهْ.
